subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain breezed through 35 pitches while facing batters in a simulated game Saturday, saying he was ready to rejoin the Yankees for the stretch run. He also threw 45 pitches off a mound on Thursday and reported no lingering problems between sessions. Chamberlain, on the disabled list with rotator cuff tendinitis in his right shoulder, said he threw all of his pitches Saturday.
